::Zardus::

Zardus nods, stopping at a door. He knew she was probably right about 
the reprogramming.

"This is the lab. But be careful, the ship will be watching you very 
carefuly, and you and Squizzy are not to approach each other."




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> "Because reprogramming me would do no good since nobody here 
understands my
> circuitry." Lady Hawk knew that nobody on this planet except Veratis
> understood her, for once she was glad to be unique. "And creating an
> obedient slave might change the results of the experiments I'm 
working on."
